{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-07-14T17:02:49.000Z", "description": "

Job Title: Data Warehouse Lead

Location: Vancouver, WA

Job Type: Contract

Visa: USC, GC


Job Description:

Expert-level knowledge of data warehousing patterns and processes

Expert-level knowledge of SAP Data Services platform, including configuration, development, testing, and administration

Solid knowledge of ETL patterns and processes, including data quality and data privacy management

Solid knowledge of data integration patterns and processes, including batch and streaming architectures

Solid knowledge of Oracle 12c database (or greater) and ANSI-SQL and PL/SQL languages

Solid knowledge of Power BI development and processes

Solid knowledge of testing strategies and automation specific to data pipelines

Familiarity with agile development practices

Familiarity with Microsoft Azure platform including common data pipeline and automation tools and integration gateways

Familiarity with DataOps principles for driving data quality throughout the application lifecycle

Familiarity with metadata management

Experience working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment

Good documentation habits and judgment

Good task management, status reporting, and adaptability to change.


If you are interested kindly apply through the below link:

https://bit.ly/3yWeZQn


Recruiter Details:

Mohamed sheik

(302) 310-5458

sheikmd_us@falconsmartit.com


Find all current job openings at our Career Page

https://www.falconsmartit.com/FalconCareer.html
